name: The Bread Must Rise
description:
The Great Godstone Bake-off has arrived! As a hapless baker deeply in debt, you finally have the opportunity to rise to fame and fortune! Under the tutelage of famous chefs as Gordon Ramslayer, Tira Misu, and The Baladin, you will learn the arts of baking, breading, and dare you whisper it...necromancy?

"The Bread Must Rise" is a 350,000 word interactive comedic fantasy novel by Stewart C Baker and James Beamon, where your choices control the story. It's entirely text-based—without graphics or sound effects—and fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination.

Will you learn the fate of your parents? Will the evil Carb Freeons corrupt you to their carb-less baking ways? Will you woo the judges with your vegan substitutions? And how exactly will you convince that chupacabra to give you its sweat—an excellent sweetening element?

The city of Godstone will never be the same!
